Distance Learning Information - Regarding Remainder of the Year
April 14, 2020
Students and Parents,
First of all, I hope everyone is staying safe and healthy during the outbreak of the COVID-19 virus. It has been a learning experience for all of us. At Northwestern, we are constantly gathering new . . .

div.p:
Extended School Closure Letter
March 28, 2020
Dear Northwestern Patrons,
The Chariton County Commission will issue a Stay At Home order effective March 30, 2020, and continue until April 24, 2020. After communicating with our County Health Officials and other county School Administrators, Northwestern R-I will suspend classes and all . . .
